titles.title: A bill to establish a Corps of Engineers Flood Control Civilian Advisory Council, and for other purposes.
Corps of Engineers Flood Control Civilian Advisory Council Act
Corps of Engineers Flood Control Civilian Advisory Council Act
Corps of Engineers Flood Control Civilian Advisory Council Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Corps of Engineers Flood Control Civilian Advisory Council Act
This bill establishes a Corps of Engineers Flood Control Civilian Advisory Council. The Council must make recommendations on how to prioritize flood control and navigation in the Missouri River Mainstem Reservoir System Master Water Control Manual.
